channel.title: Shop problem
channel.description:
[img]http://aycu13.webshots.com/image/15092/2004071514077185553_rs.jpg[/img] I created a shop with the command making thing and i added it corectly and all (thsi is what it syas to add) [code] shop = 29 Horviks_Armor_Shop 1 1 1103 5 1107 4 1105 4 1109 3 1117 5 1115 4 1119 3 1125 2 1121 1 1067 1 1133 1 1097 1 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Add this line to shops.cfg. under the last shop spawn = 549 3229 3438 0 3232 3440 3227 3437 2 Varrock Armor Shop ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Add this line to autospawn.cfg. Above you know } else if (NPCID == 549) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 29; ECHO is off. ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Add this lines to client.java with your shops. search wanne shop (ctrl+F) wannae shop [/code] it should be working perfectly but idk whats the problem :\ maybe i deleted something in the client.java when i removed all the shops that i didint want after downloading sorce?
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 12:27:16 PM[/size][hr] ur all wrong lol. i put all that in. the shop isint a command. and i did put the shops in with items. if u noticed thename isint showing also[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 12:27:16 PM[/size][hr] [quote]used a shopmaker. But I believe he is trying to Trade them, when he should Talk to them. I've had this problem myself. [/quote] its testscape talking to them talkes to haorvik. hes the ivisable armor quest guy. walking to any of the shopkeepers wont do anything.

all my problems on here are like unsolvable it seems. lmao.

im gunna try making a diffreant npc to host the shop and see if it works.
in mean time see if ya can still help me all

door bug problem - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,134115.0.html
Varrock bug fix help needed - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,135873.0.html[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 10:40:28 PM[/size][hr]It worked. theres somethign wrong with the horvik npc.
i set it to the npc that ya trade diffreant and the store works
i just need a replacement horvik (a diff npc though)
till i can fig out how to get rid of quest.

is there a tut to removing it?

item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

s3rv3r:

Hmmm, maby hovirks already beeing used another shop? Or is the wanneshop == 29 the wrong shop number?

correct number. no i checked no other shops taking his npc id. even so there would be both shops items or just one of them. or trading him would crash or freeze server etc.

I think i just figured a bit of it out just well sittign down.

anyway the testscape sorce has that dum invisable armor quest. meaning the npc id is getting used by it with dialog. im guessing it may be inturupting it somehow so non o f the shop info can get to him…
otherwards il have to try another npc and replace horvik or find a way to remove that stupid useless quest.

it doesent even work anyway. clicking it does the d long spec instead of showing items and quest info

if ur horvik shops work and u stil got quest etc etc… post cause i ont wanna mess around with the quest getign hundreds of errors and fixing and fixing for somethign that isint the answer

Read full topic

item.title: Shop problem
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

Sick of Air:

Don’t Trade them, just Talk to them. For some reason the Trade option does that for some shops, so just use the Talk option.[/quote][quote=“Sick of Air, post:8, topic:97012”]He said he used the “command making thing”. I’m guessing that he used a shopmaker. But I believe he is trying to Trade them, when he should Talk to them. I’ve had this problem myself.

[quote=“s3rv3r, post:11, topic:97012”]IDK i have a quick guess, does the person you talk to have 2 things to click on example: |---------|
| TALK |
| TRADE |
|---------|[/quote]

this isint the problem.

and all shop keepers that you can trae have talk im pretty sure…
plus when you talk to the one shop that doesent work he talks to you cause its the invisalbe armor quest junk… testscape.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 10:11:25 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Bobby, post:12, topic:97012”]did u compile? maybe u forgot?[/quote]
the thread was a couple days ago, i compiled about 50 times allready…
